original_title: Committee appointed to probe hospital deaths linked to ‘substandard’ drugs
original_body_lines: Minister of Health Keheliya Rambukwella has appointed a committee in order to investigate into the recent deaths at government hospitals which are suspected to have occurred owing to the complications from certain substandard medicines.
When inquired by Ada Derana, the Minister asserted that the committee chaired by Prof. Chandima Jeewandara, comprises of five members.
